snippet: A divided federal appeals court ruled Saturday that it would not intervene in the scheduled trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is accused in the 2013 bombing.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules 2-1 that it will not intervene in scheduled trial of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, striking down effort by Tsarnaev's defense team to delay trial and change venue.
lead_paragraph: A divided federal appeals court ruled Saturday that it would not intervene in the scheduled trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is accused in the 2013 bombing.

headline.main: Change of Venue Denied for Boston Marathon Bombing Suspect
headline.print_headline: Change of Venue Denied for Marathon Bombing Suspect
